main.blocks:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables>
    <variable id="p`e/T8.3pFRYIZiI!U97" type="">温度</variable>
    <variable id="SN,_`h|ja[}3UnAlxzI=" type="">item</variable>
  </variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="0" y="0">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="basic_show_icon">
        <field name="i">IconNames.Happy</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="device_forever" x="2" y="152">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="variables_set">
        <field id="p`e/T8.3pFRYIZiI!U97" name="VAR" variabletype="">温度</field>
        <value name="VALUE">
          <shadow id="y41f,rc)W6Fle$ZiMfiY" type="math_number">
            <field name="NUM">0</field>
          </shadow>
          <block type="device_get_analog_pin">
            <field name="name">AnalogPin.P2</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="device_show_number">
            <value name="number">
              <shadow id="yu^Qf7z{zGp`rq=:/0CT" type="math_number">
                <field name="NUM">0</field>
              </shadow>
              <block type="math_arithmetic">
                <field name="OP">DIVIDE</field>
                <value name="A">
                  <shadow id="TBR}~+UWT5m~ZpdMxZxV" type="math_number">
                    <field name="NUM">0</field>
                  </shadow>
                  <block type="math_arithmetic">
                    <field name="OP">MINUS</field>
                    <value name="A">
                      <shadow id="J1M$`A@Cz*;maRKcKWZB" type="math_number">
                        <field name="NUM">0</field>
                      </shadow>
                      <block type="variables_get">
                        <field id="p`e/T8.3pFRYIZiI!U97" name="VAR" variabletype="">温度</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="B">
                      <shadow id="zSYuJ:ogF`+e)wM|qJ;#" type="math_number">
                        <field name="NUM">0</field>
                      </shadow>
                      <block type="math_modulo">
                        <value name="DIVIDEND">
                          <shadow id=";0=HE)81h}F!xgbRrx]s" type="math_number">
                            <field name="NUM">0</field>
                          </shadow>
                          <block type="variables_get">
                            <field id="p`e/T8.3pFRYIZiI!U97" name="VAR" variabletype="">温度</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                        <value name="DIVISOR">
                          <shadow type="math_number">
                            <field name="NUM">5</field>
                          </shadow>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="B">
                  <shadow type="math_number">
                    <field name="NUM">5</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
